text.title: Join Our Contest and Win Big!
text.description: Participate in our exciting contest for a chance to win amazing prizes!
text.howToParticipate: To participate, simply follow the instructions on our website.
text.termsAndConditions: Terms and conditions apply. Please read them carefully before participating.
